ygData.subject: Re: Hunting wisps
ygData.msgSnippet: I hunt wisps in West Comm and, with a partner, find at leats one every 3 or 4 minutes. Sometimes we take on 3 or more at once. West Comm is very wisp friendly.
ygData.messageBody:
I hunt wisps in West Comm and, with a partner, find at
leats one every 3 or 4 minutes. Sometimes we take on 3
or more at once. West Comm is very wisp friendly. You
do have valid points about YKs and other beasties
though. I doubt you can risk West Comm at your level.
That is the best place I have seen them so far.
Although... there is an alternative. Get on the boat
from free port and get off at the first stop. This
island has many wisps and not much else. (Don't attack
spiders, they swarm.)

Try that island.
Go with Truth,
Brother Kingdok
monk of the 20th season (as of last night woohoo!)
Erollisi Marr Server
